```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(osmdata)
library(sf)
library(overpass)
library(sp)
library(ggmap)
```

```{r}
# https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Map_Features

road_primary <- 
  getbb("Ames, Iowa") %>%
  opq() %>%
  add_osm_feature("highway", "primary") %>%
  osmdata_sf()

road_secondary <- 
  getbb("Ames, Iowa") %>%
  opq() %>%
  add_osm_feature("highway", "secondary") %>%
  osmdata_sf()

city <- 
  getbb("Ames, Iowa") %>%
  opq() %>%
  add_osm_feature("place", "city") %>%
  osmdata_sf()

religion <- 
  getbb("Ames, Iowa") %>%
  opq() %>%
  add_osm_feature("amenity", "place_of_worship") %>%
  osmdata_sf()

park <- 
  getbb("Ames, Iowa") %>%
  opq() %>%
  add_osm_feature("leisure", "park") %>%
  osmdata_sf()

ames_map <- get_stamenmap(getbb("Ames, Iowa"), zoom = 12, maptype = "toner-lite")

ggplot()+
  geom_sf(data = city$osm_multipolygons,
          color = "#ffffff",
          fill = "#e6e6e6",
          alpha = 1) +
  geom_sf(data = park$osm_polygons,
          color = "#ffffff",
          fill = "#acc388",
          size = 0,
          alpha = 1) +
  geom_sf(data = road_primary$osm_lines,
          color = "#ebba76",
          alpha = 1,
          size = 1)+
  geom_sf(data = road_secondary$osm_lines,
          color = "#ebba76",
          alpha = 1,
          size = 0.5) +
  geom_sf(data = religion$osm_points,
          color = "#ed1212",
          shape=3,
          alpha = 1) +
  xlim(-93.7,-93.52)+
  ylim(41.98,42.08)+
  theme(axis.line=element_blank(),
        axis.text.x=element_blank(),
        axis.text.y=element_blank(),
        axis.ticks=element_blank(),
        axis.title.x=element_blank(),
        axis.title.y=element_blank(),
        panel.background=element_rect(fill='transparent'),
        panel.border=element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major=element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor=element_blank())

```
